member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.ILinkingProvider.GetArtifacts(System.String[])
member.returns: The return value is an array of objects that complies with the Team Foundation Generic Artifact Display Schema (GAS).When an artifact for which an ID appears in the artifactUris cannot be returned, its corresponding element in the returned artifact array is set to null.
